title: Glottography dataset derived from Wurm and Hattori 1981/83 "Language atlas of the pacific area"
description:
Cite the source of the dataset as:

Wurm, S. & Hattori, S. Language Atlas of the Pacific Area: New Guinea area, Oceania, Australia, vol. 66 of Pacific Linguistics: Series C (Canberra: Research School of Pacific and Asian Studies, Australian National University, Canberra, 1981). Wurm, S. & Hattori, S. Language Atlas of the Pacific Area: Japan area, Taiwan-Formosa, Philippines, Mainland and insular South-East Asia, vol. 67 of Pacific Linguistics: Series C (Canberra: Research School of Pacific and Asian Studies, Australian National University, Canberra, 1983). Registered scans and GIS dataset released by the Electronic Cultural Atlas Initiative (ECAI).
